section.heading: Denial of a license.
section.text: The Mayor may, subject to the right to a hearing, deny an initial or renewal license to an applicant who fails to establish that the applicant meets the requirements for licensure established by this subchapter and rules issued pursuant to this subchapter.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to § 7-2031.
